# DTC World Corporation

### Sustainable Corporate & Promotional Gifts

DTC World is a trusted global leader in corporate gifts, event gifts, and promotional merchandise, delivering high-quality, creative, and eco-friendly solutions that make brands stand out. We are on a mission to redefine the gifting industry by embedding sustainability into everything we do.

As an EcoVadis Platinum 2024-certified company and EcoVadis 2025 Regional Sustainability Leadership Award winner, we rank among the top 1% of businesses globally for ethical sourcing, responsible manufacturing, and sustainable supply chain practices.

By choosing DTC World, brands don’t just give gifts — they create impact, drive engagement, and contribute to a greener future. Let’s make sustainability the standard in gifting — one thoughtful gift at a time.

DTC World is a trusted global leader in corporate gifts, event gifts, and promotional merchandise, delivering high-quality, creative, and eco-friendly solutions that make brands stand out. We are on a mission to redefine the gifting industry by embedding sustainability into everything we do.

As an EcoVadis Platinum 2024-certified company and EcoVadis 2025 Regional Sustainability Leadership Award winner, we rank among the top 1% of businesses globally for ethical sourcing, responsible manufacturing, and sustainable supply chain practices.

By choosing DTC World, brands don’t just give gifts — they create impact, drive engagement, and contribute to a greener future. Let’s make sustainability the standard in gifting — one thoughtful gift at a time.
